item.title: John Blund: Treatise on the Soul
item.description: Review of D.A. Callus and R.W. Hunt (eds), John Blund: Treatise on the Soul. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2013, with a new introduction and English translation by Michael W. Dunne (Auctores Britannici Medii Aevi II) for the British Academy
